gahaniya newe pirimiyayi wenas...ee pirimiya gahaniyawa pawichchi karanne naha...pawulak kiyanne gahaniyageyi pirimiyageyi dennagema wagakimak widiyatayi poduwe batahira samajaya salakanne...api maha lokuwata sanskruthiya kare dagena daruwanta serama athata payata karala dila kiyanawa api daruwanta aadare kala., eyala wenuwen nokala deyak nahayi kiyala...demapiyo inne unge wahal sewayata kiyala hithana daruwo loku wela, ammalawa danawa mahalu niwasa walata...mokada demapiyo widiyata daruwanta wagakimak ganna idak thiyala naha...aadare karanawa kiyanne daruwanta jiwithaya kiyala dena eka misaka, kanna bonna dila, andum hodala dila, serama dewal langata karala dena eka witharakma newe...ookama thamange swami purushayatath aadalayi...ganiyek kiyanne gedara wadapala karanna inna kanna bonna redi hodanna inna kenek witharakma newe....biththi hatharak geyak karanne, pirimiyekta hawasata awith aadaren sanasenna thanak hadanne gahaniyek...ape gahanu ude indan uyala pihala redi hodala, daruwo hadala hawas wenakota hathara gathen...hitha yatin aadare hoya hoya windawanawa...gahaniya rakiyawakata yanawa nam thathwe thawath darunuyi...anthimata ethana pawulak naha...rutin ekak witharayi...oya aasiyawe poduwe thathwe...ooka nawathinne kochchiye eka pawulak, ofis eke thawa pawulak, bukiye wenama pawulak hadagena...mita wadiya wenas aadare pirunu jiwithe windina pawul oone tharam thiyanawa...batahira ratawala thathwe wenas...honda pawulak thiyana oonema thanaka, gahaniya saha pirimiya dennama samabarawa wagakim bedagannawa, dennama rakiya kalath nathath, mehe thiyana wegawath kala satahan ekka ehema nokaloth, jiwithayak nathi wenawa...minissu wisheshayen salli, kalaya wen karala pawul pitin niwaduwakata yanawa...jiwithe windinna welawak aniwaryen wen karanawa...mona tharam rajakari thibunath denna demahallo, rathri aahara welakata, ehema nathnam sinama patayak narambaanna yanawa...oya ekakwath hari nogiyoth diwos wenawa...ee diwos welath daruwo wenuwen muna gahenawa...thamange gani ho miniha gedara thiyala pita yana ape sadachara samajeta wada me kramaya mata nam hondayi...sinhalen kiyanawa nam lankawedi reddak hodaganna bari pirimi mehe awith rassawal thuna hathara karana gaman, ganita uyanna pihanna daruwo balaganna seratamath udaw karanawa mama dakala thiyanawa..ithin koheda wenasa aruna..katussa, malaya godak sthuthiyi me mathrukawata...
